Description:
Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes.

Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Tony Lambert), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bypass UAC via Fodhelper.exe
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%\fodhelper.exe'
